sourcesContent: import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { Modal, Button, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; import {URL_IMAGE_PREFIX} from "../../constants"; import './example.css' const Example = (props) => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( <> {props.movieDetail.title} .col-xs-12 .col-md-8 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 ); } export default Example;
